name: calculate_repayment_schedule
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool loan_amortization_calculator.
Tool description: This API calculates Amortized loan repayment with details.
API description: Calculates the repayment schedule for a loan using specified parameters.

installmentcount.description: Number of installments for the loan repayment.

annualinterestrate.description: Annual interest rate of the loan.

startdate.description: Start date of the loan repayment schedule.

repaymentinterval.description: Repayment interval, defaults to monthly if not provided.
